tech_news.title: More Hunters Per Match Being Tested - huntshowdown.com
tech_news.description: Hunt: Showdown is a competitive first-person PvP bounty hunting game with heavy PvE elements. Set in the darkest corners of the world, Hunt packs the thrill of survival games into a match-based format.

tech_news.title: Fitbit founders launch AI platform to help families monitor their health - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Luffu uses AI in the background to gather and organize family information, learn day-to-day patterns, and flag notable changes so families can stay aligned and address potential well-being issues.
